replies.author: WB199861
replies.txt_content:
@ECHO OFF
SET BINDIR=%~dp0
CD /D "%BINDIR%"
"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar mcpc-plus-1.6.4-R2.1-forge965-B223.jar
PAUSE
我的Java在C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe求换
